switchSceneWithController(String, String, Consumer<Object>) - Static method in class com.learneria.utils.SceneManager
Switch scene and give access to the new controller for setup (e.g., passing parameters) Example usage: SceneManager.switchSceneWithController("/path.fxml", "Title", controller -> { if (controller instanceof SomeController c) c.setData(...); });
